name: google-signin-signup
description: Production-ready authentication and payment processing system with Next.js frontend and Django backend

scripts.install:backend: cd apps/backend && python -m venv .venv && .venv/Scripts/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:backend: cd apps/backend && python -m venv .venv && .venv/Scripts/pip install -r requirements.txt && .venv/Scripts/python manage.py migrate
